JdbcDriverConf.Name: MySQL2
JdbcDriverConf.MetadataQueryTablesList: SELECT table_schema,table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=?
JdbcDriverConf.MetadataQueryColumnsList: SELECT table_schema,table_name,column_name,data_type AS datatype_name,is_nullable AS nullable,column_default AS default_value,numeric_precision,numeric_scale FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE table_schema=? AND table_name=? ORDER BY ordinal_position ASC;
JdbcDriverConf.MetadataQueryFksList: SELECT table_schema AS pktable_schem, table_name AS pktable_name, column_name AS pkcolumn_name, referenced_table_schema AS fktable_schem, referenced_table_name AS fktable_name,Referenced_column_name AS fkcolumn_name FROM information_schema.key_column_usage WHERE constraint_name != 'PRIMARY' AND table_schema=?
JdbcDriverConf.MetadataQueryPksList: SELECT table_schema AS table_schem, table_name , column_name FROM information_schema.key_column_usage WHERE constraint_name = 'PRIMARY' AND table_schema=?
